text: Kangelo(; also known as Kangelou) is a village in Rastupey Rural District, in the Central District of Savadkuh County, Mazandaran Province, Iran. Kangelo Castle is historical site from Sasanianempire proud in this village. BararDeh Spa and area is a pretty area in kangelo village. 300px ==References== Category:Geography of Mazandaran Province Category:Populated places in Savadkuh County
title: Kangelo
